import React, { Fragment, useRef } from 'react' import Loader from "../layout/Loader/Loader" import "./LoginSignup.css" import { LockOpenOutlined, MailOutlineOutlined } from '@mui/icons-material' const LoginSignup = () => { const loginTab = useRef(null); return (

switchTabs(e, "login")}>Login

switchTabs(e, "register")}>Register

setLoginEmail(e.target.value)}>
setLoginPassword(e.target.value)} />
Forget Password?
) } export default LoginSignup
